summary: Email correspondence between a U.S. Attorney's Office contractor and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding the addition of new Deutsche Bank discovery materials to a pending folder for the Epstein case. The email discusses the placement of financial records for review.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sends an email notifying a contractor about placing a new production of Deutsche Bank materials in a pending folder for the Epstein case.

events.title: New Deutsche Bank Discovery Production
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney places a new production of Deutsche Bank materials in the SECOND PRODUCTION pending folder for the Epstein case, continuing from prior materials.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: New Deutsche Bank discovery materials were produced in the Epstein case on or around August 5, 2019.
The materials were placed in a 'SECOND PRODUCTION pending folder' specifically for Epstein.
The production continues from prior Deutsche Bank materials, starting with document reference DB-SDNY-0001711.
The communication highlights ongoing financial investigation into Epstein by the Southern District of New York.
The email demonstrates procedural coordination between an AUSA and a contractor regarding evidence handling.
